trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sunbury
There were no other sightings in Sunbury on or around July 16th 2010
Summary: Orangish red glowing object of some source.
divs: sighting detailsi was setting on my front porch when i happen to look off to my right towards my neighbors house and this object orangeish red light what appeared to be a glowing god knows what it was but so strange it was coming towards my way west and stopped in mid air and sat in one spot for a couple of minutes and looked to me like it was pulsating and real bright to dim then it went back the way it was coming away from me and i watched as it got off in the distance that i couldn't see it anymore if anyone seen this object please feel free to email me *(wit's email deleted--sgonzalez\cms) i have not a clue what it was and i know it wasn't no plain nor helicopter this is what i saw right up close me and my mother please fallow the link (youtube link moved to addtl evidence-- sgonzalez\cms).
